item.title: [HEVD exploit 系列] StackOverflowGS
item.description: 0. 前言 HackSys Extreme Vulnerable Driver (HEVD) 是出于学习内核的漏洞利用技巧而开发的具有多个漏洞的 Windows 驱动程序。本文介绍了 Windows 10 64 位环境下如何绕过带有 /GS 保护措施的栈溢出漏洞，涉

item.title: [HEVD exploit 系列] StackOverflow
item.description:
目标函数 TriggerBufferOverflowStack __int64 __fastcall TriggerBufferOverflowStack(void *Src, unsigned __int64 Size) { char Dst[2048]; // [rsp+20h] [rbp-818h] BYREF memset(Dst, 0, sizeof(Dst)); ProbeForRead(Src, 0x800ui64, 1u); DbgPrintEx(0x4Du, 3u, "[+] UserBuffer: 0x%p
", Src); DbgPrintEx(0x4Du, 3u, "[+] UserBuffer Size: 0x%X
", Size); DbgPrintEx(0x4Du, 3u, "[+] KernelBuffer: 0x%p
", Dst); DbgPrintEx(0x4Du, 3u, "[+] KernelBuffer Size: 0x%X
", 0x800i64); DbgPrintEx(0x4Du, 3u, "[+] Triggering Buffer Overflow in Stack
"); memmove(Dst, Src, Size); return 0i64; } 保护措施：
